page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN BROOK.
page.content: As{BROOK}is only a small village it does not offer a large range of employment to the young people in the area. A certain amount of jobs are available in the local farms,but this is not enough to supply the local working population with an income.This means that many people move to other areas through necessity or choice.The village therefore suffers from a lack of young people. Those who choose to remain in Brook are forced to travel out of the village to find employment.This means they must either rely on the infrequent public transport or own their own transport. Therefore BROOK is a problem area for employment on the{ISLE OF WIGHT.} {
